body:
This is a first draft of spack troubleshooting guide as discussed in slack https://spackpm.slack.com/archives/C5W7NKZJT/p1614658400183900?thread_ts=1614646156.182400&cid=C5W7NKZJT 

I'd reconsider this into FAQ instead of `Troubleshooting` guide so if we have recurring questions we just capture them in this place and it will be easier to point users here instead of having them find in user docs. I can see this being useful at NERSC when troubleshooting user software tickets, and I would just reference this page assuming we build out this content. Most users would end up having build errors which i think is out of scope unless there is a recurring error that needs to be addressed to entire community.
title: spack troubleshooting guide
